generic.transaction_rejected_through_metamask: You have rejected the transaction via MetaMask.
generic.transactionWillFail: This transaction will most likely fail
generic.footer: © LOB – License on Blockchain | Terms of usage | Acknowledgements

termsOfUsage.title: Terms of usage
termsOfUsage.text:
This program is free software; you can use it under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 3 as published by the Free Software Foundation.
This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but without any warranty; without even the implied warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
See the GNU General Public License for more details, see .

acknowledgements.title: Acknowledgements
acknowledgements.text: The LOB wallet uses the following open source packages:

enableInstallation.title: Show Installation Actions
enableInstallation.description: Enable actions needed to activate software installations using LOB licenses

enableIssuerActions.title: Show Issuer Actions
enableIssuerActions.description: Enable actions to issue new licenses using LOB

enableVerificationActions.title: Show Balance Verifications Actions
enableVerificationActions.description: Enable actions to verify another address's balance

enableMarketplace.title: Enable LOB Marketplace
enableMarketplace.description: Enable the LOB Marketplace to offer licenses for sale

enableDebugOptions.title: Show Debug Settings
enableDebugOptions.description: Show settings to debug the LOB wallet

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language the LOB wallet shall be in

web3Latency.title: Web3 Latency
web3Latency.description: Artifical latency introduced to every web3 call

trackerRunDebugging.title: Tracker Run Debugging
trackerRunDebugging.description: Warn when Tracker.autorun is run to often

confirmation.deleteLocalData: Are you sure you want to delete all locally stored data? This action will not affect any data stored on the blockchain.

heading.licensesWithWarnings: Licenses that may not be valid

hover.temporaryBalance: Licenses given to you that may be reclaimed by the original owner
hover.reclaimableBalance: Licenses you have transferred to someone else but have the right to reclaim them

noLicenses.ownedAccounts: You don't currently own any licenses
noLicenses.otherAccounts: This address does not currently own any licenses

licenseCertificate.title: License certificate
licenseCertificate.certificate_signed: This certificate has been signed on __signDate__ using the SSL certificate with public key fingerprint __sslFingerprint__.
licenseCertificate.sslCertificateInfoLink: To view extended information on the SSL certificate used to sign this license contract and verify that those have not been revoked, click here.
licenseCertificate.revoked_error: This issuance has been revoked by the issuer on __revokeDate__ with the following reason: __revocationReason__

transferDescription.licenses_not_transferred: The licenses have not been transferred on yet.
transferDescription.licenses_completely_transferred: The licenses have all been transferred to %s.
transferDescription.licenses_completely_transferred_indirect: The licenses have been completely transferred to you, but these transfers may have been partially indirect (with other intermediate owners).
transferDescription.licenses_partially_transferred_indirectl: %s licenses have been transferred to you, but these transfers may have been partially indirect (with other intermediate owners).
transferDescription.no_owned_licenses: You do not currently own any licenses of this issuing.

sslCertificateInformation.title: SSL Certificate Information
sslCertificateInformation.revocationWarning: The LOB wallet does not check if this SSL certificate has been revoked. For instructions on how to check the revocation status click here.

sslCertificateRevokeCheck.title: Check SSL certificate revocation status
sslCertificateRevokeCheck.instructions: To validate that this SSL certificate has not been revoked, check its revocation status using OCSP, for example by using the webservice provided at https://decoder.link/ocsp. For this copy the PEM-encoding of the certificate presented below, paste it into the text area on the linked web page and click "Check".

to.title: To
to.description: The address that shall reclaim licenses

issuance.title: License
issuance.description: The license that shall be reclaimed

error.no_license_selected: You need to select a license to reclaim
error.from_not_valid: This is not a valid ethereum address
error.amount_not_specified: You need to specify how many licenses to reclaim
error.amount_less_than_balance: You can only reclaim %s licenses from the selected account
error.amount_zero: You need to reclaim at least one license

from.title: From
from.description: The address from which you want to transfer licenses

to.title: To
to.description: The address you want to transfer the licenses to

transfer.destroyLink: If you wish to destroy a license click here.

error.recipient_equal_to_sender: The recipient must be different from the sender address
error.no_issuance_selected: You must select an issuance to transfer
error.no_amount_specified: You must specify how many licenses you want to transfer
error.amount_zero: You need to transfer at least one license
error.amount_less_than_balance: You cannot transfer more licenses than you own

error.noLicenseContract: You don't have a license contract to issue licenses with yet

error.disabled: This license contract has been disabled

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: The license contract under which licenses shall be revoked

revocationReason.title: Revocation Reason
revocationReason.description: Specify a reason why this issuance is being revoked

confirmUndoable.title: I understand that I will not be able to undo the revocation of a license

error.no_licenseContract_selected: You need to select a license contract under which licenses shall be revoked
error.no_issuance_selected: You need to select a license to revoke
error.no_revocationReason: You need to specify a reason why you revoke this issuance
error.confirmUndoable_not_checked: You need to acknowledge that you understand that the revocation of licenses is not undoable

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: The license contract you want to sign

warning.title: I understand that I will not be able to issue any more licenses under this license contract after it has been disabled and that there is no way to enable the contract again

error.warning_not_checked: You need to acknowledge the consequences of disabling the license contract

rootContract.title: Root Contract
rootContract.description: The root contract you choose to create your license contract under defines the legal framework of your license issuings

issuerName.title: Issuer Name
issuerName.description: The name of the person or organisation issuing licenses under the license contract. This should correspond to the common name in the SSL certificate in the best possible way.

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Specification of the liability you grant for each license issuing

safekeepingPeriod.title: Safekeeping Period (Years)
safekeepingPeriod.description: The number of years you will keep all documents you inspected as part of the license issuing

sslCertificate.title: SSL-Certificate (PEM encoded certificate chain)
sslCertificate.description: Your PEM encoded SSL certificate. Should intermediate certificates be necessary to trace this certificate back to its certificate authority, add the certificates of the chain underneath each other, starting with your certificate.

sslPrivateKey.title: SSL private key (optional, PEM encoded)
sslPrivateKey.description: The private key that corresponds to your SSL certificate to check that you will be able to sign the license contract. It will never be transmitted from you computer. If you do not want to enter your private key, you can also generate the signature yourself using OpenSSL in the next step.

error.no_root_contract_selected: You need to specify under which root contract you want to create your license contract
error.no_issuer_address_selected: You need to choose which address to use for future license issuings
error.no_issuerName_entered: Please provide your or your organisation's name that matches the name on the SSL certificate
error.no_safekeepingPeriod_entered: Please specify, how long you keep purchase records
error.sslPrivateKey_does_not_match: The private key does not match the given certificate

waitForContractCreationMining.title: Waiting for contract creation to be mined

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: The license contract you want to sign

manualSignature.title: Signature
manualSignature.description: You can also generate the signature locally using OpenSSL. For this, install OpenSSL, download the license certificate here, save it and run the following command on the command line: openssl dgst -sha256 -sign privateKey.key -hex CertificateText.txt. For this you need to have access to the private key of your SSL certificate privateKey.key encoded as PEM. Afterwards copy the hex signature into this text field. By signing the license certificate, you agree that you have read it and agree to its contents.

privateKey.title: Private SSL key
privateKey.description: The private key for the SSL certificate you provided when creating the license contract. The key will never be transmitted anywhere but only be used to generate the signature.

confirmCertificateText.title: I hereby confirm that I have read and understood the above certificate text and want to legally bindingly sign it with my private key
confirmCertificateText.description: In order for you to be able to issue licenses, you need to sign the above text with your private SSL key, so that licensees know who you are

error.alreadySigned: This license contract has already been signed
error.privateKey_empty: Private key must not be empty
error.signature_verification_data_not_loaded_y: Data necessary to verify the signature not loaded from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment and try again
error.privateKey_verification_data_not_loaded_: Data necessary to generate the signature not loaded from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment and try again
error.confirmCertificateText_not_ticked: You need to confirm that you want to legally bindingly sign the above certificate text

licenseContract.title: License Contract
licenseContract.description: Choose the license contract under which to issue the license

licenseTemplate.title: Template
licenseTemplate.description: If you are issuing one of the licenses in this list, use the pre-defined code and description

code.title: Code
code.description: A unique code for the type of license to be issued

description.title: Description
description.description: A human readable description of the license to be issued

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Number of licenses to be issued

auditTime.title: Audit date
auditTime.description: The date at which you performed the license audit

auditRemark.title: Audit remark
auditRemark.description: A free text remark you want to add regarding the audit

initialOwnerAddress.title: Initial owner address
initialOwnerAddress.description: The Ethereum address of the initial owner of the licenses

issuanceFee.title: Issuance fee
issuanceFee.description: The fee that will be paid to LOB for issuing the license

error.licenseContract_not_valid: You have not selected a license contract
error.code_empty: Please enter a code for the license type
error.description_empty: Please enter a description of the license type
error.amount_empty: Please specify how many licenses to issue
error.amount_zero: You need to issue at least one license
error.auditTime_empty: You need to specify when you performed the audit
error.auditTime_in_future: The audit cannot be in the future since it has to already been performed
error.initialOwnerAddress_not_valid: This is not a valid Ethereum address
error.issuanceFee_not_fetched: The issuance fee has not been fetched from the blockchain yet. Please wait a moment for the value to update and try again

browserNotSupported.title: Browser not supported
browserNotSupported.message:
The LOB Wallet requires Chrome or Firefox
with the MetaMask extension to access the Ethereum Blockchain

firefoxTooOld.title: Firefox too old
firefoxTooOld.message: The LOB Wallet require at least Firefox version 57. Please update your browser.

chromeTooOld.title: Chrome too old
chromeTooOld.message: The LOB Wallet require at least Chrome version 63. Please update your browser.

metamaskNotInstalled.title: Metamask not installed
metamaskNotInstalled.message: The LOB Wallet requires MetaMask to communicate with the Ethereum Blockchain. Please install MetaMask.

pendingEthereumAccessPopup.title: Pending Etherum access
pendingEthereumAccessPopup.message: Allow the LOB Wallet to connect with you Ethereum account through MetaMask.

ethereumAccessNotAuthorized.title: Ethereum access denied
ethereumAccessNotAuthorized.message: The LOB Wallet requires access to you Ethereum account to show your licenses.

metamaskLocked.title: Metamask locked
metamaskLocked.message:
MetaMask is locked.
Please unlock MetaMask by clicking on the MetaMask logo in the top right corner and entering you MetaMask password.

signatureValidationError.certificate_chain_could_not_be_parsed: The SSL certificate chain could not be parsed
signatureValidationError.certificate_chain_not_valid: The SSL certificate chain is not valid
signatureValidationError.certificate_not_valid_at_sign_date: The SSL certificate is only valid from __notBefore__ to __notAfter__ but the license contract was signed at __licenseContractSignDate__
signatureValidationError.license_contract_not_signed: The license contract has not been signed yet
signatureValidationError.generic: The validation of the certificate's signature failed

issuanceValidationError.issuance_revoked: The issuance has been revoked by the issuer
issuanceValidationError.management_takeover: The owner of the root contract has taken over control for the license contract that manages this license.
